pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiblock Data Fusion in Statistics and Machine Learning // Functions and datasets to support Smilde, Ns and Liland (2021, ISBN: 978-1-119-60096-1) "Multiblock Data Fusion in Statistics and Machine Learning - Applications in the Natural and Life Sciences". This implements and imports a large collection of methods for multiblock data analysis with common interfaces, result- and plotting functions, several real data sets and six vignettes covering a range different applications.
